topic.title: Secret Management API
topic.shortdesc: An Administrator can change the master password and data key. Rotating the key and resetting the password require authentication.

section.title: POST /node/controller/changeMasterPassword
section.p: This command sets the master password.

ul.li: newPassword - Specify a new master password. Required.

section.title: POST /node/controller/rotateDataKey
section.p: This command rotates the data key.
